forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 23C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 74F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 63F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 47F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 47F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
